channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped rubbish bags, 21st November
item.description:
2 bags of rubbish have been dumped and now opened and ribbons has strewn onto pavement an road outside Crease park. Seems to be a common occurrence

item.title: Broken drain, 21st November
item.description:
Broken drain,water can't flow causing large flooded area. Ground is sunken. Flood risk to traffic. Has been like this for over a year

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped fridge/freezer on pavement, 21st November
item.description:
Previously reported on 28 October. The is a fridge freezer located on the pavement outside 43 Kingsdale Road. It has been there for months and apart from being an eyesore it causes accessibility issues
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsdale Road, Plumstead

item.title: Waste spillage from road workers nearby, 21st November
item.description:
Workers digging up outside No. 1 Villiers moved debris down towards Churchfields Tip area and in doing so spilled large debris all over the road! This is dangerous considering the amount of traffic floor due to school and tip being nearby. Unacceptable mess from builders digging up the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seward Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded road markings, 21st November
item.description:
The road markings from Montagu Road, through to Conduit Lane and Meridian Way, near Tesco need to be repainted. They are barely visible in dry conditions, and invisible in wet conditions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montagu Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stop J fronting 191, High St, Penge - missing timetables 194, 227, 358 from bus stop 2 panel display., 21st November
item.description:
Stop J fronting 191, High St, Penge - (Soecsavers) - missing timetables 194, 227, 358 from bus stop 2 panel display. 1 display panel is completely empty and can accommodate the three timetables. The N3 timetable is present in the other display panel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Danger of drowning -Broken fence leading to river, 20th November
item.description:
The fence is broken leading from the pavement to the river, a child could easily fall in and drown, believe this needs immediate attention. Hampden Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Road, Elmers End, Greater London
